name: Globetrotter (itch) (Ville Westermark)
description:
In Globetrotter, you are Rupert - The Insterstellar Mailman.

You deliver mail and you do it better than anyone.
Rupert might not always be the fastest - but the mail always come through.

Control Rupert with your phones gyroscope and do what you are the best at in the galaxy, deliver mail.

Made during a Game Jam a weekend in January 2019.

The Game Jam was held at The Game Assembly Malmö in collaboration with game studio King.

Winner of category Best Theme.

Rikard Carlsson - Level Design, Music, Programming
Ville Westermark - Animation
Emma Hugin - 3D Art
Rémi Mrozek - Programming
